name: Oriental Legend 2
overview:
Oriental Legend 2 was produced by IGS in 2008.

A horizontally scrolling beat 'em up that use the Journey to the West story as a backdrop. The title is very complex as it involves utilizing equipment and multiple special moves to defeat your foes. Unlike other beat 'em up titles this one allows players to block most enemy attacks.This title uses an optional electronic card system to save players progress and items each time they play the game.
